title: Immersive AR/VR-Based Program to Enhance Perceived Employability of Vocational High School Students

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Practice-Oriented Education Through AR/VR Content Utilization in Smartphone-Centric Limited-Tech Environments

learning_goals: Learners can perform job-related problem-solving tasks in AR/VR simulation environments with over 80% accuracy
Learners can improve perceived employability by over 15% through immersive learning experiences based on UTAUT2 variables (performance expectancy, effort expectancy, etc.)
Learners can effectively apply job skills acquired through virtual experiences to real job interview situations with over 70% success

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
